Blog.post: urlLink Mike Only of MIT City

Hey Everyone... theres another MIT City concert coming up. It's on August 7th at the Degrassi House in Toronto. Admission is $7 and you get a free hotdog, and a great show. Opening for MIT City is a great band called Still Life Still ( urlLink www.stilllifestill.ca ). Doors are @ 7:00, everyone come on out its going to be awesome. For more information contact me by email ( urlLink spud_monkey29@hotmail.com ) or go to urlLink www.mit-city.com P.S. Both MIT City and Still Life Still have MP3's on there websites if you want to check them out!

MIT City is a Toronto based band, lead by Mike Only. I first heard of them when coming out of the Taking Back Sunday/The Used/Blink concert when someone gave me a "MIT City Swearing Dictionary". After speaking to Mike, and getting a taste of the music, I only got more interested. MIT City likes to interact with its fans on msn and is currently building a fan base. There music is original and they arent afraid to explore with there sound. You can check out some MP3's of there music on there website, read there bio, or browse through pictures. Mike is currently booking local shows with MIT City in the GTA. They have an upcoming show on August 7th, so everyone should come and check it out MIT City, artists of the month
urlLink Adam of Taking Back Sunday on the left, and Alexisonfire on the right....strange resemblace urlLink

1. Paul McCartney / John Lennon (Beatles) 2. Zack De La Rocha (Rage Against the Machine) 3. Davey Havok (A.F.I) 4. Mick Jagger (Rolling Stones) 5. Chris Carabba (Dashboard Confessional) Honourable Mentions; Adam Lazzara (Taking Back Sunday) Chris Conley (Saves the Day)
1. Travis Barker (Blink 182) 2. Carter Beauford (the Dave Matthews Band) 3. John Bonham (Led Zeppelin) 4. Jerry Edmonton (Steppenwolf) 5. Ringo Starr (Beatles)

Recomended Bands/ CD's (Top 5...no particular order) Dashboard Confessional (Unplugged) Taking Back Sunday (Tell All Your Friends) Billy Talent (Billy Talent) Yellowcard (One For the Kids) Various Artists. (Another Year on the Streets. Vol. 3)

Hey everyone, I just wanted to let you know that on July 10th there is a MIT CITY concert at the Oasis Degrassi House... they are a great band, if you want to learn more about it, check out some pictures, or just listen to some of their songs check out --> www.mit-city.com other info: tickets are $7, and it includes a free hotdog or veggie dog. **Also theres a great band opening for them called Still Life Still Check out the concert, and tell all your friends
urlLink Dashboard Confessional again.... if anyone wants to see more concert pictures just let me know urlLink
urlLink Dashboard Confessional in concert, May 2004. It was amaizing! urlLink
